HOME.BANNER_TITLE: Transform your space with elegant blinds and shutters
HOME.BANNER_DESCRIPTION: At Besi Storen we specialize in providing quality blinds and shutters to transform your living or working spaces into stylish and functional environments.
HOME.ROLLLADEN_DESCRIPTION: Versatile and functional window covering solution
HOME.SONNENSTORENSTOFFE_DESCRIPTION: Add a touch of elegance and comfort to your home.
HOME.INSEKTENSCHUTZ_DESCRIPTION: Enjoy a bug-free environment with our quality insect screens
HOME.PLISSEN_TITLE: Fabric roller blind and pleated blind
HOME.PLISSEN_DESCRIPTION: Introducing our fabric blinds - the perfect blend of style and functionality
HOME.SONNENSCHIRME_DESCRIPTION: Experience ultimate shade and relaxation with our parasols
HOME.ROLLLAMELLEN_DESCRIPTION: Enhance your space with our versatile roller blinds
HOME.LAMELLENDACH_DESCRIPTION: A louvered roof allows for individual control of sunlight, ventilation and rain protection
HOME.SEITENGLASS_DESCRIPTION: Both functional and aesthetic, they allow natural light to enter the space while offering views of the surrounding area

CARDS.DESCRIPTION: Our mission is to present the best quality for your home
CARDS.CARD_1_DESCRIPTION: Support your decisions with expert advice.
CARDS.CARD_3_DESCRIPTION: Efficient and professional installations for great results.
CARDS.CARD_4_DESCRIPTION: Reliable and competent repair services for your needs.

MATERIALS.DESCRIPTION: At Besi Storen we aim to use only the highest quality materials for our installations and repairs. We work with trusted manufacturers to source durable blinds and shutters that not only enhance the aesthetics of your space, but also provide functionality and durability for years to come.

PARALLAX.DESCRIPTION: If you need store installation or repair and you think our company is the right choice, please contact us.

SERVICES.DESCRIPTION: Discover our comprehensive range of services, tailored to all your needs
SERVICES.BERATUNG_DESCRIPTION: At our company, we believe in empowering our customers to make informed decisions when it comes to roller blinds. Our team of experts strives to provide comprehensive advice tailored to your specific needs. Whether you want to increase your privacy, control sunlight or create a stylish outdoor space, we'll guide you through the options available and help you choose the perfect sun protection solution.
SERVICES.MESSUNGEN_DESCRIPTION: At Besi Storen, we take precise measurements to ensure your sun blinds fit perfectly. We visit your site, carefully assess the windows or exterior areas where the sunblinds will be installed, and take precise measurements to ensure a custom fit.
SERVICES.MONTAGE_DESCRIPTION: When installing sun blinds, our company values professionalism and precision. Our experienced installation team is well equipped to handle the entire process smoothly. Once measurements have been taken and the sunshade blinds are complete, they are carefully installed by our experienced technicians to ensure a secure and flawless fit.
SERVICES.REPARATUR_DESCRIPTION: We offer fast and reliable services to ensure the longevity and optimal performance of our products. Whether it's a broken mechanism, damaged fabric or any other repair need, we aim to restore your roller blinds to full functionality.

OFFER.DESCRIPTION: Take advantage of our free offers and experience the unparalleled quality and convenience we have to offer.

DATA.DESCRIPTION: Data takes place within the framework of the legal regulations. If personal data is transmitted via the communication, order, contact or registration forms that have been set up , these will only be used for the purpose stated in each case. In particular, the data will not be passed on to third parties unless there is a legal obligation or express permission.
DATA.PERSONALDATA_DESCRIPTION: Corresponding log files are saved each time a Besi Storen GmbH website is accessed.This storage is for internal, system-related and statisticalpurposes only. This is the connection data of the computer, the websites searched for, the date and duration of the visit, the identification data of the browser and operating system type used and the website from which the connection originates.Other personal information is not recorded. If you provide personal data, this will only be used for the technical administration of the website.
DATA.COOKIES_DESCRIPTION: In order to be able to provide the best possible service within the framework of our Internet offer, cookies can be used. These are small text files that are stored in the visitor’s Internet browser. They serve to recognize the Internet browser, but not to identify you personally. All data is recorded anonymously and does not contain any personal data inaccordance with Art. 4 No. 1 GDPR. If you have any questions about the above notices, you can also email us at the email address below. We’re happy to answer them.

COOKIES: This website uses cookies. If you continue to use the website, we will assume your consent.
